strIntroduction: Wooden spoons have been around as long as human beings have been preparing food. They can be made with just a few simple tools, and the possibilities for designs and styles are endless. They also present a great opportunity to learn about wood grain and how it behaves. Join Kkday on first foray into spoon making!
strTitle: 【Carpenter DIY】Carve Your Own Wooden Spoons

strIntroduction: Fun hot spring trip to Lushan in autumn and winter seasons. Immerse in the hot spring water and melt away your stress. Throw away the city worries aside and enjoy the health benefits of Lushan Hotsprings!
strTitle: Lushan Hot Springs Experience from Cingjing

strIntroduction: At Orchid Island, the bottom of the ocean is not just blue — it’s in color! Divers are treated to great visibility at Orchid Island; you can see up to 50 meters when conditions are good. The water offers great photographic conditions, even better than those in many other vacation island spots. When you visit Orchid Island, don’t miss the chance of diving in Taiwan’s best and clearest sea!
strTitle: 【Underwater Discovery】Discover Diving Experience on Orchid Island

strIntroduction: Do you dare to charge through the jungle? With the power of your ATV's 4-wheel drive engine, you will motor past all obstacles as you plunge deeper into primal woods. Let the need for speed surge through you. Challenge your driving abilities as you twist and turn down the winding road.
strTitle: Driving ATV at South bay beach, Kenting

strIntroduction: Bubble Tea shops are popping up all over the world. Bubble Tea was originated from Taiwan in the early 1980's. Great epeectation to visit this so called “the birthplace of bubble tea”. Enjoy your drinks with experience Tea House Culture in ChunShuiTang.
strTitle: ChunShuiTang Bubble Tea DIY

strIntroduction: Well-known scenic sites in Taipei's Northeast include: Yehliu, Jiufen, and Shifen. Want to see the famous Queen’s Head at Yehliu in the morning? Savor taro at Jiufen for lunch? And light up sky lanterns at Shifen in the afternoon? There's also the famous Vigor Kobo DIY pineapple cakes! It all makes for the perfect one-day Taipei trip.
strTitle: 1-Day Tour around Yehli, Jiufen and Shifen

strIntroduction: Taipei's Youth Park " Picnic fun " Season launch different themes each month through companionship in the form of the picnic, gastronomy, wines, board games, Live Music, talk up topic. Filled full of surprises in this afternoon!
strTitle: 【Picnic Fun】 Live Music fun picnic in Taipei

strIntroduction: Let's enjoy the autumn colors of Taichung! The half self-helping package tour to Aowanda, Nantou includes shuttles, forest sight seeing, cruising, cycling, travel by cable car at the mysterious Sun Moon Lake area and at night a stay at the best-recommended hotel, Crownmonth Hotel.
strTitle: 2- Day Package Tour to Aowanda and Sun Moon Lake

strIntroduction: Don't just get your feet wet on Orchid Island for 3 days, soak in the beautiful blue sea and scenery , from head to toe. From the mountains to the sea Orchid island is home to some of the most picturesque views imaginable. Snorkel in the clear waters and bath in the cold springs! Have the unique experience of breaking through waves on a traditional Tatara Canoe.
strTitle: 3-day package tour at Orchid island and Taitung

strIntroduction: The Sun Moon Lake Ropeway starts from Formosan Aboriginal Culture Village and ends at the Ita Thaw Settlement in Sun Moon Lake for a total distance of 1.87 km. The 7-minute ropeway ride allows visitors to view the beautiful sceneries of the Sun Moon Lake from the sky.
strTitle: Aboriginal Culture Day Tour in Sun Moon Lake

strIntroduction: Equestrianism combines sport, leisure, and the art of dressage. Come to Kenting Equestrian Resort Village and explore our pristine, natural horse-riding trails. No experience riding horses? Don't worry! You can trace the river on your horse, and children can ride together with an instructor. Come enjoy your return to mother nature's sweet embrace.
strTitle: Horse Riding River Adventure in Kenting

strIntroduction: Planning on going to the Xitou Monster Village or Sunlinksea Forest Park? Try our shuttle services and have an ease of mind travelling between these areas. The Taichung, Xitou, Sunlinksea shuttle service pick up location can be at any hotels within Taichung City area or the Taichung Railway Station.
strTitle: Shuttle Bus from Taichung to Xitou and Sunlinksea

strIntroduction: Before going into the water to snorkel you should be completely relaxed, leaving all of your worries on the land. Just let your eyes take in the beautiful ocean scenery. Under the guidance of an expert snorkeler, you will be able to appreciate nature's divine creations. In the tranquil sea the multitude of colorful coral and schools of beautiful fish will surround you. You may even be able to approach and take a photo with a 100-year-old tortoise!
strTitle: 【Underwater Discovery】Discover Diving Experience on Green Island

strIntroduction: 滿山遍野的花開滿整個山谷，你怎能不愛上萬紫千紅的棲蘭森林呢~跟著KKDAY慢慢走，細細品味吧!
strTitle: One day trip to Qi-Lan Forest and the Song Luo Trail

strIntroduction: First time in Taipei? Three things you need to do while you’re here: visit Yehliu GeoPark's Queen's Head Rock, light up a sky lantern in Pingxi, and sample the famous taro snacks at Jiufen Old Street while enjoying the splendid views. Get to all three of these must-visit attractions around Taipei in one day! You don't even have to worry about how to get around — just sit back and enjoy Taipei!
strTitle: 1-day tour around Yehliu Geopark, Pingxi and Jiufen

strIntroduction: The East Rift Valley is the geographical landform in between the Central Mountain Range and the Coastal Mountain Range. Standing below the high mountain range, you will find the East Rift Valley seems like a picturesque poetry. The magnificent view will take you away from reality. This trip starts off from your place of stay in Hualien, and will bring you to all MUST SEE scenic spots in Hualien.
strTitle: 1-day tour around East Rift Valley

strIntroduction: One day trip to the rift valley and coastline in Hualien. Participants will be picked up from a bed and breakfast or the train station in Hualien. After the guests have been picked up, they will be taken along the rift valley down south. On the return trip, the ride will be along the coastline, so guests can see the Pacific shore scenery. This is a perfect one day scenic trip of Hualien!
strTitle: One Day Tour to East Rift Valley and Coastline in Hualien

strIntroduction: Coming to the beautiful eastern Taiwan, you can consider to stay in Green Island for scuba diving and exploring the magnificent sea world, as well as going on a night visit to find Formosa Sika Deers; and stay another day in the pure land of Taitung to go for an adventurous rafting experience in Xiuguluan River. This trip offers you a complete package to travel in Green Island and Taitung, with planned itinerary, transportation and accommodation all being taken care of, so you could take in the beauty of nature in eastern Taiwan.
strTitle: 3-day package trip including scuba diving in Green Island and rafting in Xiuguluan River in Taitung

strIntroduction: When you visit Hualien, you can feel its slow rhythm and leisurely atmosphere. If you want to get to know Hualien's art culture in depth, you can visit the Adick Driftwood Art Studio. Here, visitors can make their own driftwood art, then visit the Yoshino Temple for a bike ride through the fields and alleys. This half-day Hualien art trip let you see a different side of Hualien!
strTitle: Hualian's Handmade Driftwood Experience and Cycling Half Day Tour

strIntroduction: Taichung area, have you thought of where you want to go yet? Taichung chartered car service can take you to see the paintings of the rainbow granddad at the rainbow village or watch the sunset over the Gaomei Wetlands. Families and couples love to go to Moncoeur to take pictures, additionally Feng Chia, the birthplace of Taiwan's night markets, is a popular destination. The chartered car is able to take you to any location within the Taichung urban area for the whole day, where do you want to go? KKday will take you there!
strTitle: 8-Hour Chartered Taichung City Tour

strIntroduction: Our local professional guides will take you on a pedal-powered rickshaw tour of the ancient Hengchun Old Town!
strTitle: Old Town Tour by Rickshaw in Hengchun

strIntroduction: Blue Ocean House Vacation Village is right next to the beach and is home to your host, an extremely experienced snorkeler. Whether you want a relaxing snorkeling experience along the coast or to go into deeper waters to snorkel, this trip provides both. There's no need to waste time and effort on arrangement for this outing, just let down your hair and relax on this trip.
strTitle: Snorkeling at Orchid Island's Blue Ocean House

strIntroduction: The cool fall and winter weather is the perfect time to visit Hualien! Come visit the Butterfly Valley Resort, one of the top hot spring areas in Taiwan with two different types of hot springs (sodium carbonate spring, also called beauty spring, and the carbonate spring, also called gold spring). The surrounding camphor trees make this place into an outdoor paradise where you can relax your body and mind.
strTitle: 1-Day Trip to the Butterfly Valley Forest in Hualien

strIntroduction: Nowadays, barbecue is not a cuisine but a culture. It has even become an eating lifestyle in many countries. For decades, barbecue as an entertainment event has bonded families and friends in the most traditional way. Children rarely experience, fun catching shrimp in wild brook!
strTitle: Hulien Night Tour to River Shrimping with BBQ Dinner

strIntroduction: Cruise all the way down the road from Kaohsiung to Kenting. No need to worry about hauling your luggage between buses and trains. You'll begin your journey to Kenting by chartered car, allowing you to save some precious travel time. Upon arrival in Kaohsiung, you'll begin your eight hour tour, ending at the Kenting Guesthouse. Enjoy the beautiful scenic locations along the road. You can also choose to return to Kaohsiung from Kenting; all in all, you'll conserve energy and save half day of travel time!
strTitle: Pricate Chartered Day Tour from Kaohsiung to Kenting

strIntroduction: The hot days of summer are the perfect season to see the Orange Day Lily (also known as the Lotus) which blooms at dusk (and sheds its pedals in the daylight) in Fuli's Sixty Stone Mountains. Appreciate the golden flowers, gently swaying in the breeze, under the blue skies. It's a great opportunity to take in all of nature as you appreciate this wonderful flower.
strTitle: 1-Day trip to Hualien's Sixty Stone Mountains (Taitung starting point)

strIntroduction: The Taichung night sightseeing bus with take you overnight to Taichung. Beginning at the delicious Feng Chia Night Market you will visit the Taichung Opera House, Qiu Valley Ecological Park and the state Office of Taichung. Taichung is even more beautiful by night.
strTitle: Taichung Night Market Tour

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Taitung train station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Taitung train station

strIntroduction: There are many great, yet hard to access scenic spots Taiwan. Let our chartered tours take you to them on a great, relaxing tour of Taiwan's secluded beauty. KKday provides you with access to 19 cities and over 300 towns with our customized chartered vehicle service and preferential pricing. Hurry up and let's explore Taiwan's beauty together.
strLocation: Taiwan, Hualien, Taoyuan, Kaohsiung, Yilan, Kenting, Chiayi, Tainan, Taipei, Taichung, Nantou
strTitle: KKday's Chartered Tour of Taiwan (3 days or more)

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Taichung Airport without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Taichung Airport

strIntroduction: From downtown Taitung take Highway 11 along the eastern seacoast and travel north to visit must see attractions like; Xiaoyehliu, Water flowing up stream, Jinzun Viewing Platform. Along this road you will be able to view the deep blue ocean. At Donghu's Jinzu Recreational Area you can get a bay-shaped liquor glass.
strTitle: Half Day tour to Donghe Jinzun in Taitung

strIntroduction: When you first arrive in Taiwan you will not be familiar with Taiwanese traffic, now there is an exclusive chartered car which takes you directly from Taichung to Sun Moon Lake (also from Sun Moon Lake to Taichung), eliminating the need for a group of people dragging suitcases to wait for a bus. Taichung chartered car service can take you in comfort directly to your accommodation in Sun Moon Lake.
strTitle: Taichung to Sun Moon Lake Transfers

strIntroduction: Hualien Taroko is the work of Mother Nature. The impressive ravine has been through ten million years of wind and water erosion. Walk on the Taroko trail, you will see the Eternal Spring Shrine, which is a Chinese style architecture, and the spectacular scene of numerous small caves appearing on the walls called The Swallow Grotto. This 30-minute trail is the essence of Taroko. When visiting Taroko, be sure to spend a day or half a day to enjoy the majestic scenery.
strTitle: Huailen Taroko Gorge Half Day Tour

strIntroduction: Taitung is a vast area with not a lot of public transportation available. Thus if you only have 1 day to spare and you want to take a trip to visit the Luye Gaotai Hot Air balloon area, Mr Brown Area and more as well as taking in the scenery along the coastal road, Sanxiantai and Little Yehliu, the travel time will take up too much of your precious time. Instead, choose our 8 hour chartered car service and pick the attractions of your choice, a guaranteed way of making full use of your only day in Taitung!
strTitle: 8-Hour Chartered Day Tour to Taitung

strIntroduction: Chartering a car from Hualien towards Taitung, driving along the Eastern Rift Valley, take in the wondrous sights at Luye Gaotai Hot Air Balloon Area, cycle along the Mr Brown Area or capture the beauty of the Liushidan Mountain Daylily zone. The choice is yours, with a professional local driver cum guide to make sure you enjoy every minute of your trip.
strTitle: 8-Hour Chartered Tour from Hualien to Taitung Along the Coastline

strIntroduction: Taipei one-day chartered car tour- avoid traffic problems and get the most out of your time! Quick! Fun! See the many different sites Hualien has to offer with the unmissable Taroko Gorge, Qingshui Cliff and Qixing Bay.
strTitle: Chartered Day Tour from Taipei - Hualien - Taipei

strIntroduction: On-site tickets cost much more at NT$300. KKday only US$4.
strTitle: Sun Moon Lake 1-day Boat Tour Ticket

strIntroduction: Taiwan is surrounded by the sea and there isn't a more beautiful coastline than on the east coast. No matter if your taking a local road through that vast expanse, coming from the south, passing through Taimali back to Taitung, or whether you are taking route 11 to Taitung, the east coast is brimming with a beautiful blue azure and incredible scenery, which changes with each passing season. If you don't want to spend too much on transportation, select the ride share trip. Have fun while you ride. A long distance road trip is a journey all its own.
strTitle: Along the Hualien coast to Kenting Day Tour

strIntroduction: Hehuanshan has long been called "Snow Country" and is one of the most beautiful corners in Taiwan. The scenery is gorgeous no matter which season people come visit. In spring and summer there are plenty of flowers to admire and is a great place to cool off in summer. In autumn and winter seasons there are plenty of snow for people to enjoy. Want to get to know the beauty of Hehuanshan better? Tour Hehuanshan with the easiest and most fun way!
strTitle: Hehuan Mountain half-day tour (From Chingjing Farm)

strIntroduction: 台北到花蓮火車票一位難求，如果一群人同行，你可以嘗試台北花蓮包車，也可花蓮到台北包車，沿途有火車看不到的景點，台灣東部最美的蘇花公路，讓你下車遊玩拍照，讓長途旅行變得好好玩。
strTitle: 8-hour chartered day tour to Taipei-Hualien

strIntroduction: 走在縱谷線上，散步在群山繚繞天地為景的縱谷線上，一路玩到花蓮/墾丁邊走邊玩。一人即可出行，天天出團，暢玩八小時！花蓮/墾丁民宿登門接駁，輕鬆遊玩！
strTitle: Along the Hualien Valley to Kenting Day Tour

strIntroduction: From Cingjing directly to Hualien. Passing through Hehuanshan and Taroko Gorge. You can easily pass through Middle Taiwan and enjoy the view driving on Taiwan's tallest road - Central Cross-Island Highway. Ride share buses are limited. Please reserve your spot as soon as you can confirm travel dates!
strTitle: Shuttle service between Cingjing farm to Hualien

strIntroduction: Chartering a car from Hualien towards Taitung, driving along the Eastern Rift Valley, take in the wondrous sights at Luye Gaotai Hot Air Balloon Area, cycle along the Mr Brown Area or capture the beauty of the Liushidan Mountain Daylily zone. The choice is yours, with a professional local driver cum guide to make sure you enjoy every minute of your trip.
strTitle: 8-Hour Chartered Tour from Hualien to Taitung Along the Valley

strIntroduction: 「故宮南院：亞洲藝術文化博物館」，是亞洲第一座以亞洲藝術文化為主題並結合台灣在地文化的大型國家博物館！還有全日式的建築的檜意森活村嘉義、到北門驛、玉山旅舍進入時空隧道，展開一趟懷舊的回憶之旅，嘉義一日遊帶給你一場藝術文化與大自然的饗宴！
strTitle: Day tour to Southern Branch of the National Palace Museum

strIntroduction: 來台中玩剛下飛機就想要立刻跑景點嗎？還是像要包車4小時到處台中吃吃喝喝呢？台中包車4小時半日遊，讓你簡單享受美好的半天，隨心所欲地欣賞美景、吃美食，快來告訴我們你想要去哪裡吧！
strTitle: 4-Hour Chartered Taichung Half-Day Tour

strIntroduction: 不必出國，全台第一最美的海底風貌就在小琉球，三天兩夜悠閒度假，每天睜開眼睛就看海，夢幻的珊瑚和綠蠵龜伴你悠游大海！
strTitle: Xiaoliuqiu Island 3 days 2 night's Packaged Tour

strIntroduction: 王功最新體驗，當地開放蛤蜊田給大家下海採蛤去 寓教於樂又好玩 還不來玩耍嗎？
strTitle: Changhua Wang Gong Clams Half Day Tour

strIntroduction: 從高雄往返墾丁除了墾丁街車你也可試試包車直達，高雄 - 墾丁包車直接送達民宿或飯店。
strTitle: Kaohsiung to Kenting Transfers

strIntroduction: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Discount e-ticket. Save up time & money with our High- Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Miaoli

strIntroduction: 難道墾丁只有水可以玩嗎？那你就錯了，墾丁密室逃脫系列，挑戰你推理邏輯、團隊合作的實力！
strTitle: Live Game of "Escape from The Secret Room" in South bay, Kenting

strIntroduction: 後壁湖觀光半潛艇的設計是為了讓一些較為不諳水性的年長或幼者旅客也能目睹墾丁海域原始珊瑚礁區裡棲息的魚類生態及海底景觀的美麗與奧妙...
strTitle: Semi SubmarineTour in Houbihu, Kenting

strIntroduction: 夢想成為沙漠中的大飆客嗎?kkday為您準備了一趟精彩的沙漠惡地之旅，開著沙灘車奔馳吧!
strTitle: Kenting's Gangzi Desert Dune Buggy Adventure

strIntroduction: 在台灣的墾丁就能與賞梅花鹿了！不用坐飛機到日本奈良， 探訪梅花鹿野外族群，由解說員帶領進行尋鹿之旅，和梅花鹿們追趕跑跳碰！
strTitle: Night Tour in Kenting to See Wild Formosan Sika Deer

strIntroduction: 四五月開始就是苗栗桐花的季節，來苗栗感受滿天滿地飛落的浪漫桐花，到湖畔花時間讓你置身鳥語花香，林木扶疏的庭園中，享受下午茶，這就是最幸福的時刻！
strTitle: 1-day tour to Miaoli to view tung blossom

strIntroduction: 台中新社的新玩法，以花海聞名的新社還有更多你所不知道的祕密景點。香菇園、白冷圳、安妮公主花園、馬力埔彩繪小徑。
strTitle: Taichung Xinshe Mushroom Garden, Princess Anne Garden Restaurant Afternoon Tea Tour

strIntroduction: 墾丁最夯運動莫屬衝浪，快來向專業老師學習如何輕鬆駕馭浪板，成為沙灘上最吸睛的陽光男女孩!
strTitle: Surfing Lesson on Kenting Beach with Shuttle service

strIntroduction: 不會游泳的人也可以在大海中與浪為舞，享受被海浪推著走的感覺，想要衝浪的人，可以先嘗試比較簡單上手的趴板衝浪哦!
strTitle: Bodyboarding Experience in South Bay, Kenting

strIntroduction: 2015新社花海節11/7~12/6隆重登場🎺漫步在繽紛彩虹般的花海中...欣賞屬於台中山城的美景，媲美北海道的超美花海景致唷～
strTitle: Taichung Zhongshe Flower City Half Day Tour

strIntroduction: Ningxia night market the best popular night market in Taipei. Has over 50yrs Historical. With more than 20 dishes & snakcs.
strTitle: 【20 Night Market Dishes】Ningxia Night Market Famous Dishes Free Queue

strIntroduction: 什麼！在墾丁除了玩水還可以騎馬？沒錯！由專業教練親自帶你體驗，不敢騎馬或不會騎馬不用擔心 KKday有“野外騎馬體驗”及“馬場騎馬體驗”兩種不同行程可選擇！
strTitle: Horse Riding at South bay, Kenting

strIntroduction: 花蓮墾丁包車，讓你邊玩邊到目的地，可以自行決定東部海岸線的停留景點，讓玩台灣東部海岸線變得很簡單，不需要再煩惱東部的大眾交通，快一起踏上東岸美麗行程吧！！
strTitle: Hualian to Kenting's Chartered Services along Coast Line

strIntroduction: 【墾丁F1賽車場】適合大人小孩，每次下來墾丁必玩之一的項目。 場地約180公尺，晚上有另外提供LED燈照明，屬於極速多彎場地!
strTitle: Go-Kart tracks in Hengchun,Kenting

strIntroduction: 小琉球讓你沈浸在夢幻般的藍色珊瑚礁中，彷彿投身海洋天堂！不必出國，擁有著美麗的海底風貌就在小琉球，兩天一夜徜徉大海，跟珍貴難得一見的綠蠵龜一起悠遊海洋！
strTitle: Xiaoliuqiu Island 2 days 1 night's Packaged Tour
Spring City Resort: Beitou Hot Spring House for 2

strIntroduction: 來到宜蘭太平山，可以觀賞到森林自然之美，多種動植物生態以及美麗的自然景觀，像是全台最大的高山翠峰湖，你可以走在環山步道，讓雲霧飄渺的美景環繞於眼前，來到宜蘭踏踏青，不要錯過這個森林秘境唷！
strTitle: Tour of Nature in Yilan’s Taipingshan (One-day tour)

strIntroduction: 親子旅遊必去景點-飛牛牧場，10小時讓你輕鬆包車慢慢玩，一同踏青去親近小動物，與柔和的陽光映襯著翠綠的青草地，綠色的波浪中夾雜著黑白相間的牛隻，遠處圍籬旁一棟紅頂白牆的農舍，散發出鄉間田野的風貌，包車來飛牛牧場親子體驗吧！
strTitle: 8-Hour Chartered Tour to Flying Cow Ranch in Miaoli

strIntroduction: 老城鎮，新走法；老味道，新體驗。台南文青小旅行，不一樣的台灣味。
strTitle: 1-Day Tour to Tainan Beimen Crystal Church

strIntroduction: 你知道太魯閣國家公園險峻地形嗎？貫穿中部的中橫公路是多偉大個工程，一起來用最輕鬆的方式，看看這大自然的傑作吧！
strTitle: Half-day chartered tour to Taroko Gorge

strIntroduction: 傳說中的世外桃源-清境，就在台灣！！你還在等什麼？快點來尋找傳說中的傳說！
strTitle: One day tour at Wushe and Evergreen Grasslands

strIntroduction: 澎湖忘憂島為澎湖南方四島隱藏版的無人島嶼，列為海洋國家公園的保護區，必須協同專業知識的導遊及專屬遊艇才能登島，將以更深度的方式，探索澎湖海域最原始的珊瑚礁生態與無人島嶼...
strTitle: 1-day tour to Penghu private island with skin diving experience

strIntroduction: Taiwan High Speed Railway 20% Off e-ticket，Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Banqiao

strIntroduction: 覺得花蓮去墾丁路程又遠又無聊嗎？那你一定錯過許多美麗的私房景點！花墾包車半日遊，讓你邊玩邊走！！讓無趣的路程變輕送好玩！
strTitle: Hualian to Kenting's Chartered Services along Valley Line

strIntroduction: 一個日治時期留下的神秘車站，變成全台著名景點之一，快跟著KKday一起GO吧！
strTitle: Jiji Train Route & Skybridge (One-day Tour)

strIntroduction: 桃機直送目的地，方便快速省時免轉車，司機開到下一間飯店門口！你只要輕鬆在車上休息，到達目的地有活力有精神！！
strLocation: Taiwan, Miaoli, Taoyuan, Kaohsiung, Taitung, Chiayi, Nantou, Yunlin
strTitle: Shuttle Service To and From Taoyuan Airport

strIntroduction: Walking in to Taipei daily life. Let's expore to Taipei traditional market.
strTitle: Taipei Hidden History and Market Tour

strIntroduction: 宜蘭公車，每班間距長，時間久，對自由行旅客極為不友善。電動二輪車絕對是旅客在宜蘭移動最方便的模式，快速移動，比起自己搭車要省時許多！
strTitle: Electric Motorcycle Rental Services at Yilan

strIntroduction: 總統小英最愛的餐廳之一，3 cafe studio裡的主廚更是蔡英文總統長年指定的私廚，獨愛台灣食材，所有料理都由他指定的在地農產品，結合咖啡、私廚美食、藝術展間重要的三個元素結合的3 cafe studio絕不能錯過，快來體驗總統最愛私廚的美味秘密！
strTitle: [ 總統蔡英文最愛私廚餐廳 ] 3 Cafe Studio 總統套餐

strIntroduction: Taiwan High Speed Railway 20% Off e-ticket，Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Nangang

strIntroduction: 來享受田園風光，拋開煩惱吧！一年一度的新社花海，絕不能錯過，看不同種類的花，集結成一片繽紛的花海就像一幅栩栩如生的畫！與其用文字形容，不如親眼見證吧！
strTitle: Sea of Flowers in Xinshe, Taichung. Only in autumns and winters

strIntroduction: Taiwan High Speed Railway 20% Discount e-ticket. Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: Taiwan High-Speed Railway 20% Discount E-ticket from Yunlin

strIntroduction: 苗栗美食一日遊開跑！品嚐道地客家菜，還有讓人一吃就愛上的清安豆腐街，吃完絕對念念不忘！
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Lungteng Bridge in Miaoli

strIntroduction: Duo Taipei在鬧中取靜的東區巷弄裡，以精緻又獨樹一格的調酒聞名，結合台灣素材的無菜單特調創意調酒，在經典裡創造更多驚喜風味，是台北年輕族群的秘密基地。
strTitle: 【台北東區餐酒館推薦】Duo taipei Bar

strIntroduction: 老梅溪最吸引人的除了溯溪活動外，還有滿山遍谷的楓紅!是不是心動了呢?快來體驗老梅溪溯溪吧~
strTitle: Laomei Creek's Upstream Trek in Shimen

strIntroduction: This tour starts with a bicycle ride along the Houfeng Bikeway and goes on to present the cultural charms of Taichung with a leisurely visit to the Chang Lien-cheng Saxophone Museum and National Museum of Fine Arts at the Art Garden.
strTitle: 【Taichung One-day Tour 】National Taiwan Museum of Fine Arts/ Hofung Bicycle Green Way

strIntroduction: 身為自然迷的你有福了!棲蘭神木園區裡擁有各種樹種與動物，隨時都有新奇的發現~
strTitle: One day trip to the Qi-Lan Forest Recreation Area

strIntroduction: 來寶島時代村彷彿搭乘了時光機，回到過往的眷村回憶，快來拍照拍到電池沒電吧~
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Formosan Aboriginal Culture Village in Nantou

strIntroduction: 到田尾花園一定要逛花店、吃花餐；到西螺一定要在西螺大橋旁拍張照、參觀傳香多年的西螺丸莊醬油觀光工廠，不然來彰化幹嘛!
strTitle: 8-Hour Taxi Tour to Watching flowers in Tienwei

strIntroduction: 還在等機場巴士嗎?還是要提著行李轉車呢? 現在立即預約” KKday超划算機場接送“專業司機送達指定地點，舒適又快速。
strTitle: Airport pick-up service：Taichung Airport - Taichung City area

strIntroduction: 牛角灣溪最為人稱道的就是多變的地形了~可以體驗所有溯溪的元素，跟著KKDAY挑戰南灣溪流吧!
strTitle: Pingtung's Niujiaowan Creek's Upstream Trek

strIntroduction: Use the KKday online car rental service when coming to Taiwan for a car tour. Pick up the rental car at the Hsinchu High Speed Train Station without need to worry that a car is not available. Enthusiastic staff will help you return your rental car. Come and experience the charm of touring Taiwan by rental car.
strTitle: Avis Car Rental Services at Hsinchu High Speed Train Station
Tour of Hengchun Peninsula (One-day tour)

strIntroduction: 有著全台最美夕陽之稱的高美溼地，及台中地標性夜景之稱的秋紅谷。讓越夜越美麗之夜遊台中成為最新型玩法！
strTitle: Half Day Trip to Gaomei Wetland, Maple Garden and Fengjia Night Market

strIntroduction: 瑪鋉溪特殊的峽谷景觀， 讓人猶如置身森林般， 是初次溯溪的最佳選擇之一!
strTitle: Malian Creek's Upstream Trek in Wanli

strIntroduction: 宜蘭放鬆小旅行，到金車城堡賞美景吃點心，到香草菲菲找尋屬於自己的幸福香味最後來到幾米的世界，一趟讓你忘卻煩惱的旅行。
strTitle: 1-day tour around Artemis garden and Mr.Brown coffee castle

strIntroduction: 得子口溪位於礁溪五峰旗風景區，我們必須通過無數峽谷、深潭及瀑布的挑戰，才得以目睹月眉坑瀑布的風采，完成這項不可能的任務。月眉坑大瀑布高約30公尺，可整個人走入瀑布下方沖瀑，做個最天然的SPA。
strTitle: Yilan's Deziko Creek Upstream Trek

strIntroduction: 滷味既方便又討喜，但要滷出好吃美味的滷味，是一大學問。總在嘴邊掛念，難以忘懷的滷味，透過雙手，挑起味蕾的記憶吧！
strTitle: The Unique Spice and Stew Cooking class

strIntroduction: 屏東海生館春季『觀珊望海』體驗活動提供住宿於珊瑚王國館獨特體驗以及搭乘半潛艇觀賞珊瑚礁，讓大人小孩可以親自與海底生物互動，與白天參觀海生館絕對是不一樣的體驗，活動多元豐富，肯定是一個難忘的回憶。
strTitle: 【春季限定】墾丁夜宿海生館-珊瑚王國館

strIntroduction: 歐美最新流行運動-SUP立槳！來台灣拉～ 比衝浪好操控、比獨木舟還穩，安全性高，任何人都好操作上手！
strTitle: Standup Paddleboarding Experience in Taipei

strIntroduction: 專屬墾丁的必遊景點一日遊，帶領你親眼見證出火奇景、造訪海角七號阿嘉的家，回味電影情景。欣賞完電影情景，別忘了探訪鵝鸞鼻燈塔，看看墾丁專屬的藍天碧海配上怪石嶙峋！
strTitle: 10-Hour Taxi Tour to Kenting

strIntroduction: － 參觀劉美玲的CSA有機農場，品嚐慢賞有機質感料理化作餐桌上的風景。 － 在合作找幸福的城市部落上一堂黃豆課、體驗豆腐DIY、學沖一杯屬於自己的豆花。 － 專業的在地導遊及司機，讓您對新竹及台中擁有不一樣的認識。
strTitle: 【有機生活美學】產地餐桌樸食農藝一日遊
